MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a fault with the power in the WA16 postcode area of Ollerton, affecting properties in School Lane, Marthall Lane and surrounding area. This is causing intermittent supply to a number of properties. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware at 4:59PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and our team will work to get your power back to normal as quickly and as safely as possible by 8PM. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 7:10PM on Sunday 14th March 2021
